spiritsExplanation: The workout is highly aligned with the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit due to its focus on relaxation, tension release, and stress reduction, as evidenced by key phrases in the title such as "Bedtime Yoga Stretch to Release Tension and Stress." The description further emphasizes this spirit by mentioning the session aims to "sooth and relax the body and mind" and "help you sleep better." Tags like "relaxing bedtime yoga," "restorative yoga," and "yoga for stress" reinforce this classification. Additionally, comments from users, expressing emotional relief and improved sleep, provide testimonial support to the session's calming and healing effects, further validating the strong classification in this spirit with a score of 0.95.
